title: SIAS releases ARTEMIS – Art Deco Greek
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317154713im_/http:/typophile.com/files/schild_Artemis_1_T_6216.jpg)

I take the pleasure to announce the release of [ARTEMIS](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317154713/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/andreas-stotzner/artemis-sans/) – the ‘beautiful Greek sister’ of Arthur Sans.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317154713im_/http:/typophile.com/files/schild_Artemis_6_T_4548.jpg)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317154713im_/http:/typophile.com/files/schild_Artemis_4_T_4453.jpg)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317154713im_/http:/typophile.com/files/schild_Artemis_3_T_5463.jpg)
author: Andreas Stötzner
